name: ahh yes, thats how the food chain works
name_original: ahh yes, thats how the food chain works
description:
ahh yes, thats how the food chain works is a card game battler where the player goes up the food chain by playing and winning matches against increasingly difficult opponents.

It's a deckbuilding game inspired by games like Inscryption, Hearthstone and Yu-Gi-Oh!

Controls:

W and S or mouse scroll to change cameras.

Made for the "Mini Jam 128"

  • Theme: Health
  • Restriction: The only way to go is up
